snippet: In a series of classes, the New York Public Library’s Jefferson Market branch will offer guidance on applying existential philosophy to affairs of the heart.
lead_paragraph: In a series of classes, the New York Public Library’s Jefferson Market branch will offer guidance on applying existential philosophy to affairs of the heart.

headline.main: Existentialism and Romantic Love in a Philosophy 101
headline.print_headline: Existentialism and Romantic Love in a Philosophy 101
